conversations.body_text: We apologize for the delay and are investigating this matter for you.

Hi Earl Snider, the courier has collected the parcel, but there has been no tracking update. The courier has yet to locate the parcel. We have now expedited a replacement shipment for you. We apologise for any inconvenience caused. Here is your new tracking link: https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack/no-results-found?trknbr=884470137425
